channel.title: Fellas With Guns Online (FWGO)
channel.description:
Hello everyone. As promised I have made a beta version of an online game. I am going to post the client download. Up to 20 people can be online at a time. For now you must use hamachi. The network ID is "BETA Test" without the quotations and the password is "beta" again without the quotations. When the client starts enter a username and enter the hamachi ip then we will start playing. Its a COD like game with only one game mode atm. But I hope you guys consider trying it and enjoy.
Controls: WASD: Movement Mouse: Aim Left Mouse Button: Fire Right Mouse Button: Scope (Snipers Only) F: Pick up weapon G: Destroy current weapon Q,E,1,2: Weapon switch
Client Download:
http://up.ht/itX1Kg
Youtube Video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=00Tbb0y-zTY
Server will go down in 12 hours from now for updates.

item.title: Fellas With Guns Online (FWGO)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Well I am adding a pretty cool minigame. Of course Im adding classic zombies, but Im also adding a new type of minigame where you play a zombie and you have to turn as many humans as possible. The more you turn the more enemies you get. First its regular people with guns, then police, then swat, the army branches, the fbi, and finally a secret government agency where they can control zombies that they have captured to infiltrate your zombie horde and attack you. You also get awesome pickups and powers as you go.

Read full topic

item.title: Fellas With Guns Online (FWGO)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

This game looks like it has a good future. And it may include:

Review:
Overall, this game looks like it has good potential. It has bugs, ofc, but it’s beta. The sniper rifle is great. And this is all I CAN say atm, because there’s nothing much to talk about. Guys just get on and try it.

Upcoming events:

[ul][li]Open sources much like moparscape (private servers/clients)[/li]
[li]Snipers will shoot over walls.[/li]
[li]Ranks to be added.[/li]
[li]Maybe even a shop?[/li][/ul]

This is all I know.

8/10.

Read full topic
